column4: help?? when i open my "add/remove programs" its list some applications that i cannot find when on my desktop, namely "tomboy notes" and "adonthell" game
help?? when i open my "add/remove programs" its list some applications that i cannot find when on my desktop, namely "tomboy notes" and "adonthell" game
tomboy notes is an applet iirc.  right click your task bar, and you should see a notes item there.
adonthell should either be in Applications > Games, or you might just have to run it directly (alt-f2, type in adonthell)
